SEARCH
Package ch.ahdis.matchbox

Class CliContext

java.lang.Object
ch.ahdis.matchbox.CliContext
@Component public class CliContext extends Object
A POJO for storing the flags/values for the CLI validator. Needed to copy the class because the setters with CliContext as return type are not accessible via reflection. In addition we have parameters from the CliContext which do not make sense to expose for the Web APi
